application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs

constraints_details.constraints_layer_description: GRCRNE Details: Froglife incidental record, apparently a house adjacent to the riding school which has a big swimming pool has GCN in the swimming pool . Pool is not usSite: Gillians Riding SchoolCode: GRCRNE9

CILRES CIL ZONE: Intermediate Zone - RATE: Â£60 per square metre

decision_conditions: This consent is valid for two years.Reason: In order that the nature of work pertaining to this consent remains appropriate.

The works hereby approved shall only be carried out strictly in accordance with British Standard 3998 [2010] 'Tree Works'.Reason: In the interests of the health, safety and appearance of the preserved trees.

Tree work should not be carried out during periods that are likely to interfere with or disturb breeding birds or mammals.Reason: In order to comply with the requirements of the Wildlife and Countryside Act (1981) and Conservation of Habitats and Species Regulations (2017) as amended.
description: Works to mix species tress covered by LBE ORDER NO 45 (1976) -Crown lift all trees up to 3m.
